Package blf.blockchains.hyperledger.instructions

Class HyperledgerSmartContractFilterInstruction

java.lang.Object
blf.core.instructions.Instruction
blf.blockchains.hyperledger.instructions.HyperledgerSmartContractFilterInstruction
public class HyperledgerSmartContractFilterInstruction extends Instruction
HyperledgerSmartContractFilterInstruction is an Instruction for the Hyperledger smart contract mode of the Blockchain Logging Framework. It queries for the requested output parameters with a respective function from the current Block and stores the extracted parameter values in the ProgramState.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(ProgramState state)
      execute is called once the program is constructed from the manifest. It contains the logic for queries from Hyperledger blocks that the BLF is currently analyzing. It is called by the Program class.
      Overrides:
      execute in class Instruction
      Parameters:
      state - The current ProgramState of the BLF, provided by the Program when called.

    • createHFClient

      private org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.HFClient createHFClient()
      Creates the Hyperledger Fabric CLient and prepares a CryptoSuite for it. The client is needed to call a query.
      Returns:
      returns a Hyperledger Fabric Client, including a set CryptoSuite.

    • processQuery

      private List<org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.ProposalResponse> processQuery(org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.QueryByChaincodeRequest queryRequest, HyperledgerQueryParameters hyperledgerQueryParameters, org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.Channel channel)
      Processes the previously instantiated queryRequest, through updating it with a function name and input parameters from the parsed Smart Contract Query of the manifest and querying the channel.
      Parameters:
      queryRequest - The request object needed for the query.
      hyperledgerQueryParameters - The parsed parameters of the manifest to perform a query.
      channel - The hyperledger fabric channel on which the query is performed.
      Returns:
      A List of Proposal Responses, which can be written into the ProgramState.

    • setValues

      private void setValues(List<org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.ProposalResponse> responses, String[] outputParameters, HyperledgerProgramState hyperledgerProgramState)
      Tries to parse the contents of the Proposal Responses to Strings. Afterwards sets it to the ValueStore of the ProgramState together with the output parameter name defined in the manifest.
      Parameters:
      responses - List of Proposal Responses, which include the returned values of the query.
      outputParameters - The output parameters defined in the manifest and which serve as variableNames.
      hyperledgerProgramState - The current ProgramState of the BLF.
